article_node.title: Today's NYT Connections Hints, Answers for Aug. 16, #797
article_node.summary: The article explains how to play and improve at the New York Times Connections puzzle, including a recent puzzle’s answers and hints for each color-coded category. It highlights the new Connections Bot, which uses AI to score players, compare them to others, and analyze missteps, as well as the introduction of detailed statistics and streak tracking for registered users. The piece also offers practical tips—such as shuffling, avoiding obvious groupings, and breaking down long words—to help players navigate the game’s tricky purple category. Additionally, it briefly touches on Wordle strategy and letter frequency data, but the main focus remains on Connections gameplay and its new AI‑powered features.
